message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique and valuable product that I think you'll love. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the value you're adding to it, but I was hoping to keep my budget under $80. Would you consider lowering the price to $90?
I understand you're looking to keep your budget under $80, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I can offer it to you for $110.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'd like to propose an offer of $100 for the product. This is my final offer within my budget.
I'm glad you're willing to meet me at $100, but I'm not ready to accept that price yet. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I can offer it to you for $115. This is my final offer above $100.
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer and would like to propose a final counteroffer of $105 for the product. This is my best offer within my budget.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $115. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer, and this time I'm not budging. I'll sell it to you for $112.50. This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, I've thought about your last offer and am willing to counter with $110 for the product. This is my final offer within our negotiations.

I'm not willing to accept $110, Bob. I think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I can offer it to you for $112. I'm not going any higher than this.
Hello Alice, I've considered your last offer and am willing to counter with $108 for the product. This is my final offer within our negotiations.
